title: Create discovery step components for fixed question flow
description:
## Objective

Create the 4 discovery step components (steps 4-7) for FO-10's fixed question flow, adapting the FO-09 StepTopics pattern for step 4 and creating step-specific chip display components.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md` — Section: "Discovery Phase Detail (Steps 4-7)"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- `app/fo-10/components/step-goal.tsx` — step 4 with predefined topic chips (reuse FO-09 StepTopics chip list)
- `app/fo-10/components/step-why.tsx` — step 5 with LLM fragments (mode="fragments")
- `app/fo-10/components/step-situation.tsx` — step 6 with LLM sentences (mode="sentences")
- `app/fo-10/components/step-support.tsx` — step 7 with LLM sentences (mode="sentences")

**Key existing code:**
- `app/fo-09/components/step-topics.tsx` — reference for predefined chip pattern
- `app/fo-09/components/fragment-input.tsx` — supports both modes (reused, already copied)

## Implementation

1. Create step-goal.tsx: text input + predefined topic chips (same 36 chips as FO-09)
2. Create step-why.tsx: text input + FragmentInput with mode="fragments" (8 initial + 15 expanded)
3. Create step-situation.tsx: text input + FragmentInput with mode="sentences" (8 initial + 15 expanded)
4. Create step-support.tsx: text input + FragmentInput with mode="sentences" (8 initial + 15 expanded)
5. Each component receives hardcoded question from FO10_QUESTIONS constant

## Tests

1. TypeScript compilation: `npx tsc --noEmit` passes
2. Verify all 4 step components export correctly

Do NOT close until acceptance criteria pass.
closed_reason: Created all 4 discovery step components: step-goal.tsx (predefined chips), step-why.tsx (LLM fragments), step-situation.tsx (LLM sentences), step-support.tsx (LLM sentences). All components use FO10_QUESTIONS for hardcoded questions and follow the FO-09 pattern. TypeScript compilation passes.
